attributes.action: Introduce a clause into the Act that states 'anyone commiting or planning any criminal act will forfeit any rights provided under the Human Rights Act".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Human Rights Act is being used by criminals and terrorists as a tool against prosecution and conviction.

The Act was never designed for such use so  needs to be revised to include the clause - or similar - that is being proposed.
